alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 22 at 5:31PM CDT until July 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTY... At 529 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 10 miles north of Winona, or 11 miles south of Levant, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspout tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed landspout tornado. IMPACT...Expect damage to mobile homes, roofs, and vehicles. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Thomas County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a landspout tornado has been spotted. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
